posts.title: Panda CSS was released
posts.body:
New generation of CSS-in-JS libraries makes it faster with no runtime style generation. 
Panda is a styling engine that generates styling primitives to author atomic CSS and recipes in a type-safe and readable manner. 
Panda combines the developer experience of CSS-in-JS and the performance of atomic CSS. It leverages static analysis to scan your JavaScript and TypeScript files for JSX style props and function calls, generating styles on-demand (aka Just-in-Time)

posts.title: New version of react-redux
posts.body: React-redux library got a new minor version 8.1.0. This feature release adds new development-mode safety checks for common errors (like poorly-written selectors), adds a workaround to fix crash errors when React-Redux hooks are imported into React Server Component files, and updates our hooks API docs page with improved explanations and updated links.

posts.title: NextJS 13.4.6 was released
posts.body: A lot of changes in the core library plus documentation updates. Fixed issues with NextJS examples and many more...

posts.title: NextJS 13.4.7 was released!!!!!!
posts.body: A lot of changes in the core library plus documentation updates. Fixed issues with NextJS examples and many more...
